name: Hidden Cats in Paris
storyline: Meow meow meow mes amies! More than one hundred cats are hidden in a unique lovely Paris scenario. A short and pleasant experience! Start with a Beautiful monochromatic illustration, relax and find all the cats one by one to reveal the final colored art.
summary: Meow meow meow mes amies! More than one hundred cats are hidden in a unique lovely Paris scenario. Start with a Beautiful monochromatic illustration, relax and find all the cats one by one to reveal the final colored art.
